review: I can't imagine this little thing being any better unless they could cut the cord on the power. Quite simply, it works as advertised. Losing the ac adapter is the only thing I would change.

review: Had to call Amazon for help with opening the remote control!  After finally opening it, had to figure out the up/down/left/right feature on the remote-had no arrows or markings.  However, after the remote was handled, the Fire TV Stick was great!
